programme.desc: On his home turf in Canada, Mark and his team chase one of nature’s deadliest forces, coming face to face with tornadoes’ shear strength.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Storm Chaser Jaclyn Whittal anxiously experiences her first Category 4 Tropical Storm.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Megacities é um documentário sobre as favelas de quatro cidades metropolitanas diferentes: Bombaim, Cidade do México, Moscou e Nova York. O filme é um relato em doze episódios sobre pessoas que lutam para sobreviver com desenvoltura, humor e dignidade.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Fast Forward - Episode 1 - 5
programme.desc: Fusão Nuclear | Corpos Biónicos | Limpadores do Espaço | Carne Criada em Laboratório | Blockchain, protocolo da confiança

programme.title: Give Up Tomorrow
programme.desc: Nas Filipinas, um homem inocente enfrenta a pena de morte num polêmico caso de assassinato que separou duas famílias e uma nação inteira.

programme.title: Gigantes - Lendas do sumo do Hawaii
programme.desc: Acompanhamos as vidas épicas das lendas do sumo que transcenderam as suas origens humildes no Havai para se tornarem nos primeiros estrangeiros a ascender aos patamares mais elevados do sumo.

programme.title: Os Segredos de La Roja – Campeões do Mundo 2010
programme.desc: No dia 11 de julho de 2010, a equipa nacional de Espanha alcançou o seu objetivo de vencer a Copa do Mundo, uma vitória que foi sentida pela equipa e pelo país como um todo. Apesar desse final bem-sucedido, “La Roja” teve que superar várias lutas e dificuldades para se tornar lendário. A equipa chegou à África do Sul com o triunfo do Campeonato Europeu de Futebol de 2008 e Vicente del Bosque a liderar o trajeto. Havia um sentimento geral de favoritismo atribuído a ""La Roja"" e, embora a derrota contra a Suíça no primeiro jogo tenha sido chocante, motivou Del Bosque e a sua equipa a unirem-se e a concentrarem-se com uma única intenção: bom futebol; e um objetivo: fazer história.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Brother's Body
programme.desc: Quando decide (voltar a) mergulhar no mundo do culturismo, David Nicolas Parel ambiciona seguir nas pisadas do seu irmão mais novo e treinar para o Arnold Classic – uma competição que deve o nome ao célebre ator e político austríaco-americano.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, em Roma, revela-se uma mulher de caráter forte, sem medo de se assumir como pioneira em qualquer domínio, como quando se torna na primeira mulher a marcar quatro golos no estádio de Wembley. Barbara Bonansea, jogadora da Juventus escolhida para a Seleção Mundial da FIFA/FIFPro de 2020, está com a sua família, incluindo a avó, que a apoiou no seu desejo de se tornar futebolista. Benedetta Orsi, jogadora noviça do US Sassuolo, fala com otimismo sobre o modo como ultrapassou a doença que a forçou a desistir do ténis mas lhe deu a oportunidade de desenvolver a sua paixão pelo futebol.

programme.title: A minha Decisão, por Andrés Iniesta
programme.desc: "São poucas as pessoas que sabem o que aconteceu quando me lesionei. Poucas sabem que tive de tomar uma decisão de enorme importância. Valia a pena continuar a jogar, ou estava na altura de parar?" Um documentário revelador sobre o lendário médio, Andrés Iniesta, quando enfrenta uma decisão crucial após uma lesão que ameaça a sua carreira. A história de um amor de longa data pelo futebol, sob a ameaça de uma situação cruel e inevitável.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, vencedora da UEFA em sete ocasiões e Jogadora do Ano de 2018 da FIFA, aguarda a chegada de Annie Fortems, uma pioneira do futebol feminino francês, e Sonia Ouchene, uma jovem e promissora jogadora do Stade de Reims, no estádio Olympique Lyonnais. Wendie recorda o início da sua carreira, as suas vitórias e momentos difíceis, como os ataques racistas que sofreu. Annie discorre sobre como a sua geração tornou o futebol feminino francês possível, apesar das ameaças de morte recebidas, enquanto Sonia fala sem rodeios sobre a disparidade salarial entre o futebol feminino e masculino. O encontro das três jogadoras será marcado pela admiração mútua.

programme.title: SEVE - Artista, Lutador, Lenda
programme.desc: Seve continua a ser uma lenda, um campeão multi-major, o homem responsável por fazer da moderna Ryder Cup um grande acontecimento. A sua paixão pelo golfe era tal que ainda criança esgueirava no campo para jogar à noite, futuramente faria o mesmo num esforço "para encontrar a magia". A sua história é contada por membros da sua família e do seu círculo interno, por outros grandes desportistas e através do material recentemente descoberto. É um conto hipnotizante de talento, crença e bravura - a história da vida de Seve… e da sua morte.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal é uma história sobre vontade, sonhos, determinação, fé, rebelião, coragem e amor. O filme convida-nos a uma jornada pelos diferentes mundos e altamente variados de Sadio - desde a vida rural numa pequena aldeia no extremo sul de Senegal até aos holofotes do futebol mundial jogando pelo Liverpool FC, vencendo as Ligas dos Campeões como número 10 e ganhando a audiência mundial. A Interação de animações, cenas de documentário, um conjunto diversificado de imagens detalhadas e de arquivo dá vida ao passado de Sadio e cria um excitante enredo cheio de emoções.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: Os Segredos de La Roja – Campeões do Mundo 2010
programme.desc: No dia 11 de julho de 2010, a equipa nacional de Espanha alcançou o seu objetivo de vencer a Copa do Mundo, uma vitória que foi sentida pela equipa e pelo país como um todo. Apesar desse final bem-sucedido, “La Roja” teve que superar várias lutas e dificuldades para se tornar lendário. A equipa chegou à África do Sul com o triunfo do Campeonato Europeu de Futebol de 2008 e Vicente del Bosque a liderar o trajeto. Havia um sentimento geral de favoritismo atribuído a ""La Roja"" e, embora a derrota contra a Suíça no primeiro jogo tenha sido chocante, motivou Del Bosque e a sua equipa a unirem-se e a concentrarem-se com uma única intenção: bom futebol; e um objetivo: fazer história.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Liderada por Rafa Nadal, a seleção espanhola era a favorita deste ano até sofrer um sério revés. O jogador número dois da equipa, Roberto Bautista, teve de deixar a disputa para voltar à sua cidade natal e ficar ao lado do pai nas últimas horas da sua vida. Sem o Bautista, Nadal e Feliciano López conseguiram heroicamente levar a equipa à final. Mas então veio a notícia que emocionou os fãs de ténis em todo o mundo: Bautista, após o funeral do seu pai, está de volta à competição e pronto para jogar. Unidos mais uma vez, os espanhóis lutam pela vitória na grande final, onde algo muito além do ténis está em jogo.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 40 Biggest Pop Groups of the 70s!

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Did They Really Do That? Top 30

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!

programme.title: 20 Biggest Selling Albums of 70s
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 20 Biggest Selling Albums of 70s

programme.title: The Complete Abba! 1973-2022
programme.desc: Quite simply the biggest hits from the biggest pop act of the 70s & now back for the 2020s - Abba! 32 songs, 9 UK number 1s.

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1979
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1979
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the last year of the decade! It was the year the brand new Sony Walkman launched in Japan & Elton John performed 8 concerts in the USSR.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1978
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1978
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Larry Grayson first shouted Shut That Door on 'The Generation Game' and Ted Rodgers rolled out his robotic dustbin on '3-2-1'.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Demis Roussos soundtracked 'Abigail's Party', Punk was the new scourge of society, but it was outsold by TV cop crooner David Soul!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, 'Ding A Dong" won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines served with a side or order of flares! It was a busy year for the Queen as she opened the Sydney Opera House & the new London Bridge.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from a year of major cultural debuts - 'Jesus Christ Superstar', 'Are You Being Served?' & George, Zippy & Bungle in 'Rainbow'!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant & Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings & pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1970
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1970
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from a year of firsts - 18 year olds were allowed to vote in the UK, Hawaii Five-O arrived on the TV & the 747 Jumbo launched from Heathrow!

programme.title: Feelgood Friday! Top 50
programme.desc: Get ready for the weekend with our selection of songs guaranteed to get you in the mood! Yes there's some cheese in our 50, but there's also heaps of quality tuneage!

programme.title: 1978 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1978!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1978
programme.desc: 1978 was another top year in music, as rock stars sang disco, everyone caught a bit of Saturday Night Fever and "Grease" was the word! Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: 1978 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1978!

programme.title: Bubblegum Pop! Top 30
programme.desc: Today we'd call it Cheesy Pop! Back then it was Bubblegum Pop, and we loved it through the 70s - with David Cassidy, Mungo Jerry, Tony Orlando, Donny Osmond & Brotherhood of Man.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Barbeque is a go-to cooking method in many cultures. Host Natalia Machado grills up delicious Argentinian barbeque favourites like Empanadas.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Sauce is king in Italian cuisine! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shows us how to cook three simple Italian sauces.

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a Mediterranean mezze-themed menu with a table to match! There's kofta, hummus, tabbouleh, fattoush, muhammara, and so much more!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this episode, Chef Robert Jewell explores recipes using two very different ingredients that start with the letter "O," oats and okra. For his first dish, Robert uses okra in a classic cornmeal cake recipe, but bumps up the flavour factor with spicy jalapenos. Robert balances the heat of the jalapeno with a tart green tomato and crunchy red onion salsa. In his next recipe, Robert keeps the heat, but switches up his recipes for a curry-spiced oat pancake. This Indian inspired dish needs something to cool it down and Robert knows exactly what that is - sweet, silky applesauce! He's up for the challenge when it comes to combining okra and oats into one dish, and the results are tasty!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Culinary expert Theresa Visintin picks the letter "B" and must combine beef with buttermilk for her challenge. But first, she works with the ingredients separately. Silky buttermilk lends itself perfectly to Theresa's battered blooming onion recipe. Using the biggest onion she can find, Theresa skillfully slices from the root down, ensuring it will bloom into a beautiful flower. She coats the Vidalia onion in egg, buttermilk and smoky spiced flour, before deep frying it. Next up, it's time for beef to get the Theresa treatment, as she prepares a crowd favourite- smoky, juicy, fall-off-thebone baked beef brisket. With the perfect balance of sweet and spicy, this meal will make you look...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: After picking "M" for this episode's challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to make meal magic using maple and mahi-mahi. She starts by combining chestnut and quinoa to create a mouth-watering medley, rich in flavour and texture. Chef Lauren adds shiitake mushrooms and drizzles the dish with a balsamic vinegar, maple syrup and rosemary dressing. Next up, she steams Mahi-mahi with red chilies and lemongrass, this savoury spice is a heavenly combination with an invigorating aroma. For the challenge, Chef Lauren seamlessly introduces both maple and mahimahi into one flavourful fusion.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pancakes, Lobster Soup, Duck, and Flan
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, wild rice pancakes! Next, lobster-lime soup! Followed by a Tuscan porchetta-style duck! Finishing with a flan with port-soaked cherries!

programme.title: Let's Brunch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Up All Night Brunch
programme.desc: Have you been up all night? There's a brunch for that! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up four decadent recipes including an indulgent Breakfast Poutine and chocolate Stuffed French Toast.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Here's a tongue twister: Theresa, tuna, tangerine! In this episode, host Theresa Visintin picks her favourite letter, "T," and introduces us to scrumptious recipes using tuna and tangerine. Theresa loves tuna and Italian cuisine, so naturally she combines both to create a mouth-watering pasta with some savoury tomato, olive, and tuna sauce. Next, Theresa satisfies her sweet tooth with a decadent tangerine parfait! Using the sweet juice of the tangerine, Theresa creates gelatin, with a hint of orange liqueur. She tops it all off by whipping up a fluffy cream to complete this sweet treat. Then it's time for a real challenge: tuna and tangerine in one recipe!

programme.title: Inside & Out
programme.desc: Today on Inside and Out, our hosts are focused on Social Wellness! Tune in for recipes, yoga, and more!

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: It's Tandoori Take-Out night as host Spencer Watts prepares five quick and easy Indian dishes that take little time, but are big in flavour.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Cheese or chocolate? Why not both! In this "C" challenge, host Theresa Visintin takes on both decadent ingredients. But first, she shows us that being cheesy is easy, especially when you stuff chicken breast with creamy goat's cheese and finely diced apples. Theresa takes the flavour one step further by coating the stuffed chicken with sage, parmesan, and panko bread crumbs, then frying it to a crispy golden brown. Next, Theresa whips up a dessert fan favourite, the decadent and oh-so-irresistible dark chocolate lava cake. Finally, Theresa has an irresistible recipe using ooey gooey cheese and warm chocolate.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: What on earth and/or sea is super fun host Kim Lallouz cooking this week for her One Big Recipe? You guessed it - Surf and Turf! First on the beach are her Singapore-inspired Chili Crab Cakes, redolent with southeast Asian aromatics and spices like lemongrass, ginger, and galangal. 'Turf's up' next with a fresh off-the-hoof Marrow Toast plate decked out with melty marrow, crispy crostini, and garlicky parsley salad. We all deserve a creamy cheesy break (right?), so of course Risotto Carbonara with Crispy Pancetta and Enoki Mushrooms follows. Braised Veal Osso Bucco is the big deal main course, all shored up surfingly with scrumptious Seared Scallops and smoky Grilled Broccoli Rabe!

programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "H" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to take on the unique flavours of halibut and horseradish. She starts with a perfectly prepared prosciutto wrapped halibut, pairing the buttery flavour of the fish with the saltiness of the cured meat. Throw in some dill potatoes and you've got a beautifully balanced dish. Next up, Chef Lauren show us how to make a delightful roast beef dip with a zesty horseradish sauce using carrots, vinegar, mayo and a little lemon. Finally, she is challenged to make a dish that combines both ingredients, and does she ever deliver!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of venison tartare, whole roasted maitake mushroom with a trio of sauces, seared scallops with a pea and fava bean puree and pepper relish, and a dandelion salad.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Plantain has a sweet reputation, but Venezuelan-born host Juan Pablo Gonzalez shows that banana's cousin also has a savoury side.

programme.title: Mucho Machado

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple and sophisticated is the best way to describe Chef Luis "Tigretón" Leon's traditional Spanish recipes. He shows us why trout and ham is the new surf and turf.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: What on earth and/or sea is super fun host Kim Lallouz cooking this week for her One Big Recipe? You guessed it - Surf and Turf! First on the beach are her Singapore-inspired Chili Crab Cakes, redolent with southeast Asian aromatics and spices like lemongrass, ginger, and galangal. 'Turf's up' next with a fresh off-the-hoof Marrow Toast plate decked out with melty marrow, crispy crostini, and garlicky parsley salad. We all deserve a creamy cheesy break (right?), so of course Risotto Carbonara with Crispy Pancetta and Enoki Mushrooms follows. Braised Veal Osso Bucco is the big deal main course, all shored up surfingly with scrumptious Seared Scallops and smoky Grilled Broccoli Rabe!

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: We pump up the power on our Junkyard Find Tow Truck. Plus a rusted-out floor in the cab has made it a danger to drive.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: It's time to reveal the engine that's going to power the 1969 Charger project, and a viewer's Chevelle gets a helping hand with a Driveway Rescue.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: The first steps you take in building any engine can lay the foundation for a reliable powerplant that lives up to its potential.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: LT and Austin take delivery on "Project Lo 'n Slo". Find out what's in store for this 53 year old C-10. Plus loose ends on the Chevy K1500 "RedTide" get tied up including gearing and a rear-end rebuild.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: The team ventures to the north Georgia mountains to pick up and test an '07 Jeep Wrangler JK, then we head to the Summit Racing store in search of parts to mod it for extreme off-road fun!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Our '69 Road Runner, nicknamed Road Burner, gets a big bump in power when we perform a Gen III Hemi engine swap.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: 4x4

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: For a very long time, Bentley and Jaguar have opted not to produce any SUVs. But after a change of mind, they developed concepts for luxurious SUVs. Are luxury SUVs really necessary or might they even be better than other luxury models?

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Nissan X-Trail and BMW X4 do not look like your typical off-roader's. But with all-wheel drive, strong diesel engines and different prices they adapt to the living conditions of many people.

programme.title: StreetWise

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Audi A6 2.0 TDI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Wiesmann MF5.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Volkswagon creates a special car for the 24 hour race at Nuerburgring.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMW's 6 series models.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the world's most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesn't fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The German Rally Championship has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. That's why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1954, Mercedes returns to the Grand Prix circuit after 20 years of abstinence.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late 1950s in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. These small cars were seen on tracks until the end of the 1970s, but their heritage would live on through an association known as Historic Formula V Europe.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: On his journey to Las Vegas, Marco drops by Big Mike in the Apple Valley, a remote area in the High Desert of California; together they meet Big Mike's bizarre friends from the Lowdown Kustos family.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The BMW 503 convertible is featured.

programme.title: Track Masters

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Fog, rain and snow means that a visit to the Eifel region isn't that pleasant.

programme.title: Is Max Verstappen Ready to leave F1? - F1 Singapore GP Updates
programme.desc: Lando Norris clinched a commanding victory at the Singapore Grand Prix, securing his third win of the season in spectacular fashion. Mark Mann-Bryans and Ben Hunt are here to break down all the post-race buzz. From three-time World Champion Max Verstappen teasing a potential exit from F1 to Daniel Ricciardo’s potential departure, there’s plenty of drama and speculation to unpack.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Full Review
programme.desc: All of the highlights from the 2024 edition of Red Bull Romaniacs.

programme.title: Why Red Bull Must Escape their "Vicious Cycle" to Win Both F1 Titles in 2024
programme.desc: Compared to the opening half of the season, where Max Verstappen utterly dominated the F1 grid, Red Bull has had less success - especially highlighted in the Italian Grand Prix where Verstappen finished 6th, Sergio Perez in 8th. But is this purely McLaren, Ferrari and Mercedes improving beyond the RB20's capabilities, or has Red Bull taken a step back, between Adrian Newey's announced departure and other problems in the team? Bryn Lucas discusses all this and more with Jake Boxall-Legge and Filip Cleeren in the wake of Red Bull's lackluster results in Monza.

programme.title: Why Monza Cemented Mercedes' Faith in Kimi Antonelli - F1 Analysis
programme.desc: After a short but sweet debut at the Italian GP, Kimi Antonelli was announced as the driver taking over Lewis Hamilton's seat at Mercedes F1 in 2025, as the 7-time world champion moves on to Scuderia Ferrari

programme.title: Motorbike TV
programme.sub-title: S00 : E05 Motorbike TV: Episode 5: The Quarry
programme.desc: In episode 5 of Motorbike TV, Graham Hoskins takes some time to indulge Lara Small’s love of all things Ducati with a comparison of the Panagale V4S vs the Multistrada. In 10-in-10 Graham and Charley Boorman interview Sam and Clare Farah, hosts of our sister show Adventure Bike TV, and then Sam, Graham and Tom Woodrow return to the Peak Districts in Tales from the Trails. In the penultimate Motorcycle Olympics, the team tackle their greatest challenge yet: The Quarry.

programme.title: Dakar 2023: Full Review
programme.desc: Check out all of the highlights from the 2023 edition of the Dakar Rally, held in Saudi Arabia and the 45th edition of the Dakar Rally organized by Amaury Sport Organisation. The event took place between 31 December 2022 and 15 January 2023. This is the fourth time Saudi Arabia has hosted the event.

programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 SUPER GT: Round 6: Sugo GT 300km Race

programme.title: F1's Top 10 Ferrari Drivers of All Time
programme.desc: Ferrari tops all the major Formula 1 statistics, and by some margin. It has more race wins, more drivers’ titles and more constructors’ crowns than any other team. That means picking out the top 10 Ferrari F1 drivers is incredibly difficult, with some top drivers and world champions missing the cut. But we’ve given it a go.

programme.sub-title: S00 : E05 Motorbike TV: Episode 5: The Quarry
programme.desc: In episode 5 of Motorbike TV, Graham Hoskins takes some time to indulge Lara Small’s love of all things Ducati with a comparison of the Panagale V4S vs the Multistrada. In 10-in-10 Graham and Charley Boorman interview Sam and Clare Farah, hosts of our sister show Adventure Bike TV, and then Sam, Graham and Tom Woodrow return to the Peak Districts in Tales from the Trails. In the penultimate Motorcycle Olympics, the team tackle their greatest challenge yet: The Quarry.

programme.title: Dakar 2023: Full Review
programme.desc: Check out all of the highlights from the 2023 edition of the Dakar Rally, held in Saudi Arabia and the 45th edition of the Dakar Rally organized by Amaury Sport Organisation. The event took place between 31 December 2022 and 15 January 2023. This is the fourth time Saudi Arabia has hosted the event.

programme.desc: Watch the sixth round of the 2024 Super GT championship from Sugo.

programme.title: F1's Top 10 Ferrari Drivers of All Time
programme.desc: Ferrari tops all the major Formula 1 statistics, and by some margin. It has more race wins, more drivers’ titles and more constructors’ crowns than any other team. That means picking out the top 10 Ferrari F1 drivers is incredibly difficult, with some top drivers and world champions missing the cut. But we’ve given it a go.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals 2022
programme.desc: In today’s Episode we´ll give you the full dose of Freestyle Snowboarding and Skiing. Young talented Athletes from all over the world can demonstrate their skills during the World Rookie Tour 2022.

programme.desc: The North Face Frontier 4* show is a kiwi freeride institution at the iconic Remarkables Ski Area in Queenstown. It runs in a weather window between Saturday 3rd and Thursday 8th September and is a big mountain freeride competition.

programme.desc: Eight world champions to be crowned in fifth and final leg of the 2022 Beach Wrestling World Series in Constanta, Romania, on September 3 to 4. 120 beach wrestler from fight for this years world champion titles in different weight classes.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #1 Japan
programme.desc: The season kick-off of the world’s most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders will be held at Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - #4
programme.desc: With the bulk of the season completed, athletes adjust their eyes to the Bec de Rosses and prepare for the season’s final competition.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 - Season Recap
programme.desc: An epic season of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 has come to an end and we take a look back at the highlights of the tour. So enjoy the water-Action of some of the best freestyle windsurfers of the world.

programme.desc: Climb

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes and over 16,000 metres of altitude. The Absa Cape Epic is the most televised mountain bike race in the world and is classified by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI) as a UCI Mountain Bike Marathon Series (SSR); this official UCI status makes it a highlight in the professional racers' calendar. The Absa Cape Epic also attracts aspiring amateur riders who want to compete with the best.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Climbing + Unicycle
programme.desc: Climbing & Unicycling – World Records & Spectacular Climbing Routes. This 26-minute show brings together 3 extraordinary athletic achievements – a climbing record at famous El Capitan, a unicycle world record , and impressive climbing images!

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: Das Konzept ist einfach: Wer von Arholma im Norden aus als Erster Landsort im Süden erreicht, wird zum Sieger gekürt. Laufen und Schwimmen sind die einzigen Fortbewegungsarten. Es gibt keine Streckenführung und freie Wahl der Route.

programme.title: Best of Mountain Trail Running
programme.desc: It’s the longest, toughest and highest one-stage trail race in the Alps: Swiss Irontrail demands a great deal of the participants through Graubünden’s unique mountain scenery.

programme.title: If it’s easy it’s not fun
programme.desc: Join us on a beatiful adventures through the sky and desert of Jordan, where three french friends seek for adrenalin and creacks in the sandstone of Wadirum (JOR).

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: Die Westwandroute mit ihrem langen Gletscheranflug durch den Circo de los Altares fühlt sich außergewöhnlich an. Dass es dem gesammten Team möglich war, mit dem Gleitschirm vom Gipfel zu starten, beweist ihr Können, sowohl als Bergsteiger als auch als Paraglider.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: The ABSA Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 648 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15 475m of climbing.

programme.desc: Die Stomp Show-Events = Park Jam und Big Air - das sind innovative, stilbezogene Wettbewerbe, bei denen die Athleten ihr Talent und ihr Können unter Beweis stellen können.

programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: Enfer & Paradis
programme.desc: Justine Dupont is on her way to be the world's best female surfer. Enfer & Paradis accompanies her in her everyday life as well as on the biggest wave in the world - Nazaré and offers insights behind the scenes of the first mixed surfing world championship.

programme.desc: Die dritte Station der King of the Court Crown Serie 2022 findet in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro, statt.

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: Für die Strecke von Ruhpolding (GER) nach Kasern (ITA), 210 Kilometer und mehr als 10000 Höhenmeter, benötigen Freizeitsportler etwa fünf bis sieben Tage. Benedikt Böhm strebt die magische Zeitgrenze von 36 Stunden nonstop an.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #2 Canada
programme.desc: The second stage of the tour will revisit champagne powder paradise Kicking Horse near Golden, British Columbia (CAN).

programme.title: A Song for Tomorrow

programme.title: Extremsportveko "The Beauty of Outdoor Sports"
programme.desc: Today, we travel all the way up to Voss, the adventure Capital of Norway, where the “Extremesportsveko” takes place once a year. During this week, national and international athletes compete and challenge themselves in their elements.

programme.title: Nedbank Desert Dash 2022 - Namibia (NAM)
programme.desc: Das Desert Dash ist mehr als ein Ausdauer-Mountainbike-Rennen, es ist eine wilde Bestie, die dich lockt und dich herausfordert. Es ist ein 393 km langer, 24-stündiger Kampf zwischen Mensch und Natur, Körper und Geist.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.desc: Die letzte Runde der Freestyle-Disziplin auf der Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour beginnt am Dienstag, 8. November. Beim Freestyle-Kite World Cup Taiba messen sich die besten Freestyle-Kiter der Welt bei perfekten Bedingungen auf der berüchtigten Lagune.

programme.title: Swissway to Heaven
programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachat's adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Biggest Peak Project III
programme.desc: Kashmir holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: Bei der diesjährigen 21. Auflage der Red Bull Romaniacs werden Teilnehmer aus rund 60 Nationen antreten, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Michael Walkner (AUT) und Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tägiges Rennen (UCI Hors Catégorie), das in Castellón, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #3 - Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro (CAN)
programme.desc: Der 3. Stopp der Freeride World Tour 2023 bringt uns nach Kanada zum Kicking Horse Golden BC Pro, (CAN).

programme.title: Digital & Virtual Sport Special Gaming Docu
programme.desc: Restart the Game 2023 & ICF Open Virtual World Cup & World Rowing Indoor Championship

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: King of the Court 2022 Finals – Doha (QAT)
programme.desc: King of the Court 2022 Finals - January 11th-14th, Doha (QAT. )Das zweite Jahr in Folge ist die Aspire Zone Gastgeber für die King of the Court Crown Series.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Line & Air - with Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.desc: Swiss snowboard legend Géraldine Fasnacht is not only one of the most praised freeriders, but also an experienced pilot. She invites Léo Slemett and Emilien Badoux, to join her riding several couloirs at some glaciers of the Swiss and French Alps.

programme.title: UCI World E-Bike Series
programme.desc: In today’s episode we’ll give you all the lowdown on the first two races of the World E-Bike Series. These events unite the muscle power of the world’s best mountain bikers with electric driven bikes. A combination that promises a lot of thrills!

programme.title: Gorges de l'Ardèche
programme.desc: France is home to several geological and aquatic wonders. In autumn, the river and its gorges are the perfect setting for a competition celebrating white-water paddling. It’s the 37th edition of the International Marathon!

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals & Mystic Sk8 Cup
programme.desc: On today´s show we´ll be city hopping. First we drop in on Innsbruck´s World Rookie Tour Skate edition and then we´ll roll on over to Prague to the legendary skate Event known worldwide as the Mystic Cup.

programme.title: Slay the Bay
programme.desc: ‘Slay The Bay’ is a urban mountain bike adventure in the San Francisco Bay area. . Hans Rey, an icon in the bike scene, on this trip accompanied by fellow Freeride pioneer Brett Tippie.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Prologue
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 1
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: Die Westwandroute mit ihrem langen Gletscheranflug durch den Circo de los Altares fühlt sich außergewöhnlich an. Dass es dem gesammten Team möglich war, mit dem Gleitschirm vom Gipfel zu starten, beweist ihr Können, sowohl als Bergsteiger als auch als Paraglider.

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The ASICS Gold Coast Marathon, a World Athletics Label Road Race, is the pinnacle of road running events in Australia and during its history has distinguished itself as one of the most prestigious marathons in the world.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #4 Austria
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Austria. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Kayak Expedition Norway "Whitewater Polar Circle"
programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championships 2021 | Rd. #1-3
programme.desc: V8 Superboats is one of the most extreme and spectacular forms of motorsport on the planet. Imagine 1600-horsepower in a purpose-built aluminium boat that can accelerate to 120kph in under 2-seconds, and turn with the kinds of G-Forces.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Teil des FWT-Finales findet in Fieberbrunn statt, wo die Athleten den imposanten Wildseeloder bezwingen müssen. Dieser Berg ist selbst für die erfahrensten Profis ein echter Härtetest und die Athleten werden sicherlich alles geben müssen.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2023 - Bangkok (THA)
programme.desc: Das etablierte innerstädtische Leichtathletikspektakel, die Golden Fly Series 2023, kehrte nach seinem ersten Auftritt in Phuket im Jahr 2021 nach Thailand zurück und fand in der Hauptstadt des Landes, Bangkok, statt.

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The ASICS Gold Coast Marathon, a World Athletics Label Road Race, is the pinnacle of road running events in Australia and during its history has distinguished itself as one of the most prestigious marathons in the world.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: King of the Court Finals - Doha
programme.desc: From January 5th – 8th, 2022 Doha, Qatar will host the King of the Court Finals at Aspire Zone. The ultimate fight for the crowns will be contested by the combined top-10 teams from Hamburg and Utrecht.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #01 ESP
programme.desc: The 2022 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in ist 15th season in January – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! Right at the beginning a brand-new stop in Baqueira Beret (ESP) awaits the athletes.

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The ASICS Gold Coast Marathon, a World Athletics Label Road Race, is the pinnacle of road running events in Australia and during its history has distinguished itself as one of the most prestigious marathons in the world.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2023 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: Das ABSA Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt aufstrebende Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus aller Welt über 648 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Season Recap
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt!

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: Enfer & Paradis
programme.desc: Justine Dupont is on her way to be the world's best female surfer. Enfer & Paradis accompanies her in her everyday life as well as on the biggest wave in the world - Nazaré and offers insights behind the scenes of the first mixed surfing world championship.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: Biggest Peak Project IV
programme.desc: 1. A world premiere: being the first speed flyers ever to descent Europe’s most active volcano: Mount Etna in Sicily (ITA)2. The peak project heads north to the Lofoten where a girls team attempts to summit and ski down the highest peak in the region

programme.title: FAI World Air Games - Teil 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games, is the premier international multi-discipline air sports event fielding the world’s top athletes. The 2015 edition of the FAI World Air Games has been awarded for the first time to Dubai.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari will go head-to-head with Estonia’s Uku Jürjendal in a GLORY Grand Prix Qualifier. Middleweight Champ Petchpanomrung will defend his belt against newcomer David Meija. Bulgarias own, Stoyan Koprivlenski, will face off with Romanian Sorin Caliniuc. Also fighting is Heavyweight Levi Rigters and Luis Tavares makes his return.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...
